Workday
Dylan Pavelko has helped Workday grow from a pre-IPO company of fewer than 1,000 employees generating $274M to an 18,000+ employee, Fortune 500 company making over $8B in annual revenue. Workday is a leading enterprise software platform that helps organizations manage their most important assets – their people and money.
Manager, Product Management 2.6 years
Passionate about building high-performing product management teams focused on delivering results.

Manager, Product Management - Los Angeles (Remote), CA Apr 2022 - Present
Leading product teams focused on delivering high-quality, consumer-based student user experiences, and sophisticated back-office processing for administrators to uphold institutional academic policies. Responsible for the Curriculum Management, Student Registration, and Academic Advising product lines, spearheading all related strategic initiatives.
  • Manage, hire, coach, and retain a team of product managers across all levels of seniority, based in offices across North America, each owning their own product portfolio and roadmap.

  • Delivered 211 customer-facing features to production over five six-month release cycles.
